name: Spideonette
description: Made for the Shenanijam 2018. We didn't make a very good game because the programmer(me) lost motivation and we weren't very organized. We still learnt a lot of valuable lessons. Maybe next time we can make a playable game. Anyways, sorry about how I kept on saying the music is good in the video and how you couldn't hear it properly. I was really tired and I said some pretty stupid stuff. Thanks for the fun and see you guys next time.
